Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Why do they keep repairing you? You are annoying…

Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: It's all due to the fulfillment of my services

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: You have to be kidding me… I will find whoever is reprogramming you and I will chase him to death

Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: I can’t let you do that. My program indicates that you must die instantly

Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: Hello I’m here to...

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Can we just avoid this talk and go straight to the point? They are waiting for me

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Can I ask you something? Why would anybody like to be with such a piece of junk, cables and gears like you?

Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: I’m not allowed to do that

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: To do what?

Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: Answering such a stupid question…

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Nice! Now this freakin robot is making fun of me!

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Don’t take It personal, I just like to destroy any kind of humanoid I see. It won’t hurt, I guess...

Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: Offensive mode activated

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Hey YOU. Why don't you just step apart. I’m getting tired of destroying you that many times

Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: That goes against my programmed orders

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Same shitty speech I guess. Well, at least I warned you…

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Can you please tell your creators to create better units. I’m getting bored with you buddy

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: You know? We could have worked together. I have to admit that you are not bad...

Lines.Speaker: IG-11
Lines.Text: What does push you away from that decision?

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Mmmmmm, I just hate your specie, nothing else
